long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SimpliFi uses OpenAi to act as a financial expert tasked with simplifying complex financial news articles into plain and understandable language.

The extension works using your API Key from OpenAI. 
Get one at: https://platform.openai.com (we never have access to it).
Here is a guide on how to get your key: https://bit.ly/3HS5t7K
